name: Teamwork
description: Integrate with Teamwork to list, list, create and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Projects
tools.description: List all projects in the Teamwork account. Returns project names, statuses, and company info.

tools.name: List Tasks
tools.description: List tasks in a Teamwork project or tasklist. Returns task names, assignees, and due dates.

tools.name: Create Task
tools.description: Create a new task in a Teamwork tasklist. Specify name, description, assignees, and due date.

tools.name: List Milestones
tools.description: List milestones in a Teamwork project. Returns milestone names, deadlines, and completion status.

tools.name: Log Time
tools.description: Log time against a Teamwork task. Specify hours, minutes, date, and an optional description.

siteName.label: Teamwork Site
siteName.description: Your Teamwork site name (the subdomain in your Teamwork URL)
